title: Copper Racks Up Longest Rally Since 2017 With Bulls at Helm
description: Copper recorded the longest winning run since 2017 in a December rally powered by the prospect of more stress in the supply chain.
content: Copper recorded the longest winning run since 2017 in a December rally powered by the prospect of more stress in the supply chain.
